Am very sorry to say that 
9 can not refund the money to you 
before you leave this country, but 
e would like to have you advise 
me, to whom shall I send the money 
in case my father sends it to mel 
after you leave. Will you be kind I 
enough to advise me what to do?

Now I must say goodbye 
to you, and send my best wishes 
to accompany you on what 9 brasit 
will be a pleasant journey.

Yours Most Sincerely,

8. 6. Luk

Am very sorry to say that 9 can not refund the money to you before you leave this country, but e would like to have you advise me, to whom shall I send the money in case my father sends it to mel after you leave. Will you be kind I enough to advise me what to do? Now I must say goodbye to you, and send my best wishes to accompany you on what 9 brasit will be a pleasant journey. Yours Most Sincerely, 8. 6. metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter apologizing for not writing because of spending time in Engineering Camp, followed by a fall that caused a leg injury and hospitalization in Fort Wayne from July 30th to September 15th. He wishes Stearns an enjoyable year abroad. Luk cannot remit money owed prior to Stearns' trip and asks for advice.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
